Problem1 Output:- 
Array is:- 
10 11 12 13 
Original array showing 32 bit binary value:- 
00000000000000000000000000001010 00000000000000000000000000001011 00000000000000000000000000001100 00000000000000000000000000001101 
After rotation array:- 
-2147483646 -1073741822 3 1073741827 
Original array showing 32 bit binary value:-
10000000000000000000000000000010 11000000000000000000000000000010 00000000000000000000000000000011 01000000000000000000000000000011


Problem2 Output:-
Enter the decimal number:- 34
Enter the base value:- 2 
34 in base 2 is:- 100010
